title: [Ta'Illistim, Caear Var]
description: The glaesine windows of a nearby cottage are thrown open, and voices rich with laughter float out upon the breeze.  Workers pull and push carts bearing cargo towards the airship docks.

The windows of a nearby shop are thrown open to catch a breeze.  Next door, a stone warehouse has been converted into multiple family dwellings, each home demarcated by its individual door.  One door is sapphire, another lapis, a third azure and a fourth a peeling dark blue.
